messages.subject: Re: Chaela -- unschooling in VA
messages.msgSnippet: Cool -- thanks, Kristie! Chaela ... this year, so we are not officially homeschooling in VA yet.  Unless you are a certified teacher, your kids will either
messages.messageBody:
Cool -- thanks, Kristie!

Chaela


--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, <kristiecochran@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Chaela,
>
> I live in Virginia. My son is 5, so I opted him out of kindergarten
this year, so we are not "officially homeschooling" in VA yet. Unless
you are a certified teacher, your kids will either have to be tested
each year (but only in language arts and math) or you could do a
portfolio review. Most use the CAT test. There are a bunch of VA
Unschooling lists on yahoo groups, based on what part of VA you are in
(also check out VA Eclectic). You should familarize yourself with
www.heav.org (Christian-based) and www.vahomeschoolers.org
(all-inclusive). Both of these sites have all the information you
need on filing your NOI (notice of intent) to homeschool.
>
> Hope this helps some!
>
> Kristie, in Portsmouth,
>

messages.subject: Chaela -- unschooling in VA
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Chaela, I live in Virginia.  My son is 5, so I opted him out of kindergarten this year, so we are not officially homeschooling in VA yet.  Unless you are
messages.messageBody:
Hi Chaela,

I live in Virginia. My son is 5, so I opted him out of kindergarten this year, so we are not "officially homeschooling" in VA yet. Unless you are a certified teacher, your kids will either have to be tested each year (but only in language arts and math) or you could do a portfolio review. Most use the CAT test. There are a bunch of VA Unschooling lists on yahoo groups, based on what part of VA you are in (also check out VA Eclectic). You should familarize yourself with www.heav.org (Christian-based) and www.vahomeschoolers.org (all-inclusive). Both of these sites have all the information you need on filing your NOI (notice of intent) to homeschool.

Hope this helps some!

Kristie, in Portsmouth,
